critique: The executive order seems to want to convey joy and surprise. The order discusses an appointment of a former member of the U.S.S. Panay who was injured in the bombing and sinking of that vessel. The audience may feel joy because Mr. Ziegler is being appointed to a position as rural letter carrier in the Postal Service. The audience may also feel surprise because Mr. Ziegler is being appointed to a position without compliance with the requirements of the Civil Service Rules.
